## âš¡ Quick Install (GUI-first)

- **macOS (M1/M2/M3 â€” Apple Silicon)**:
  ```bash
  curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/michael6gledhill/Photo_Metadata_App_By_Gledhill/main/install_m1.py | python3
  ```
- **macOS (Intel)** â€” GUI installer:
  ```bash
  curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/michael6gledhill/Photo_Metadata_App_By_Gledhill/main/install_gui.sh | bash
  ```
- **Windows** â€” PowerShell (Run as Administrator):
  ```powershell
  Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/michael6gledhill/Photo_Metadata_App_By_Gledhill/main/Install.ps1'))
  ```
- **Linux** â€” See the [Installation Guide](INSTALL_GUIDE.html#method-2-automatic-terminal-installation) for distro-specific steps. Typical prerequisites:
  ```bash
  sudo apt-get install -y git python3 python3-pip python3-venv
  ```
  then run the macOS CLI installer command (it also works on Linux).

:::{.callout-warning}
### Apple Silicon (M1/M2) Tips
- Ensure Homebrew path is on your shell: `export PATH="/opt/homebrew/bin:$PATH"`
- Use the Homebrew Python: `python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip`
- If UI libs fail to load, reinstall: `python3 -m pip install --force-reinstall PySide6`
:::
